###New Jersey Focus Tree###
###Do not edit###
focus_tree = {
    id = newjersey_focus
    continuous_focus_position = { x = 20 y = 1700 }
    country = {
        factor = 0
        modifier = {
            add = 10
            tag = NJN
        }
    }
	default = no
    ###Diplomacy Section###

    focus = {
        id = njdiplo1
        icon = GFX_goal_generic_attack_allies
        x = 9
        y = 0
        cost = 10
        completion_reward = {
            add_political_power = 200
        }
    }

#Done^

    focus = {
        id = njdiplo2.1
        icon = GFX_focus_generic_strike_at_democracy1
        x = 4
        y = 1
        cost = 10
        prerequisite = {
            focus = njdiplo1 }
mutually_exclusive = { focus = njdiplo2.2 }
completion_reward = {
army_experience = 20
add_war_support = 0.05
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = PAP modifier = Buildup }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = NYN modifier = Buildup }
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo2.2
icon = GFX_goal_tripartite_pact
x = 13
y = 1
cost = 10
prerequisite = { focus = njdiplo1 }
mutually_exclusive = { focus = njdiplo2.1 }
completion_reward = {
add_political_power = 100
add_stability = 0.1
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = PAP modifier = Unimposing }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = NYN modifier = Unimposing }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = DED modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = MDM modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = WVW modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = OHO modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = CTC modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = MAM modifier = Friendly }
reverse_add_opinion_modifier = { target = VTV modifier = Friendly }
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo3.1
icon = GFX_goal_generic_axis_build_infantry
x = 3
y = 2
cost = 10
prerequisite = { focus = njdiplo2.1 }
completion_reward = {
army_experience = 10
add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = infantry_equipment amount = 5000 producer = NJN}
add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = artillery_equipment amount = 1000 producer = NJN}
add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = support_equipment amount = 1000 producer = NJN}
}
}

				OR = {
					NOT = { country_exists = DED }
					has_capitulated = yes
				}
			}
		}

    type = bunker
    level = 4
    instant_build = yes

      all_provinces = yes
      limit_to_border = yes
    }
        }

			}
}

focus = {
id = njdiplo8.2
icon = GFX_goal_generic_production
x = 9
y = 7
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo7.2}
completion_reward = {
NJN = { random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = industrial_complex
						size > 3
						include_locked = yes
					}
				}
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
				add_building_construction = {
					type = industrial_complex
					level = 4
					instant_build = yes
				}
        } }
every_other_country = {
	limit = { is_in_faction_with = NJN }
random_owned_controlled_state = {

        limit = {
          free_building_slots = {
            building = industrial_complex
            size > 3
            include_locked = yes
          }
        }
        add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 4
        add_building_construction = {
          type = industrial_complex
          level = 4
          instant_build = yes
        }
        }
}
}
}
#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo9.1
icon = GFX_goal_generic_small_arms
x = 3
y = 8
bypass = {
        OR = {
				PAP = { is_subject_of = NJN }
        OR = {
				NOT = {
					any_country = {
						original_tag = PAP
						exists = yes
					}
				}
          }
    }
    }
cost = 5
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo8.1}
completion_reward = {
add_timed_idea = { idea = p_prep days = 180}
army_experience = 20
}
}

focus = {
id = njdiplo9.4
icon = GFX_goal_generic_navy_battleship
x = 13
y = 8
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo8.4}
completion_reward = {
random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = dockyard
						size > 2
						include_locked = yes
					}
				}
				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
				add_building_construction = {
					type = dockyard
					level = 3
					instant_build = yes
				}
        }
        random_owned_controlled_state = {
        				limit = {
        					free_building_slots = {
        						building = dockyard
        						size > 2
        						include_locked = yes
        					}
        				}
        				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
        				add_building_construction = {
        					type = dockyard
        					level = 3
        					instant_build = yes
        				}
                }
                random_owned_controlled_state = {
                				limit = {
                					free_building_slots = {
                						building = dockyard
                						size > 2
                						include_locked = yes
                					}
                				}
                				add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
                				add_building_construction = {
                					type = dockyard
                					level = 3
                					instant_build = yes
                				}
                        }
add_ideas = trade_dominance
}
}

#Done^

focus = {
id = njdiplo10.1
icon = GFX_goal_generic_territory_or_war
x = 3
y = 9
bypass = {
        OR = {
				PAP = { is_subject_of = NJN }
        OR = {
				NOT = {
					any_country = {
						original_tag = PAP
						exists = yes
					}
				}
          }
        }
    }
cost = 5
prerequisite =  {focus = njdiplo9.1}
completion_reward = {
NJN = {
declare_war_on = { type = annex_everything    target = PAP }
}
}
}

focus = {
id = njdiplo11
icon = GFX_focus_smiling_buddha
x = 4
y = 10
cost = 10
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo10.1}
prerequisite = {focus = njdiplo10.2}
available = {
Or = {
				PAP = { has_capitulated = yes }
        OR = {
				PAP = { is_subject_of = NJN }
        OR = {
				NOT = {
					any_country = {
						original_tag = PAP
						exists = yes
					}
				}
        OR ={
        NYN = { has_capitulated = yes }
        OR = {
        NYN = { is_subject_of = NJN }
        OR = {
        NOT = {
          any_country = {
            original_tag = NYN
            exists = yes
          }
        }
		}
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
    }
completion_reward = {
country_event = newjersey.9
}
}
#Done^

###Polindustree###

focus = {
id = njmid1.1
icon = GFX_goal_generic_secret_weapon
x = 23
y = 0
cost = 5
mutually_exclusive = { focus = njmid1.2 }
completion_reward = {
add_popularity = {
ideology = communism
popularity = 0.2
}
add_popularity = {
ideology = fascism
popularity = 0.2
}
}
}

#Add all^
focus = {
id = njmid1.2
icon = GFX_Goal_support_democracy
x = 32
y = 0
cost = 5
mutually_exclusive = { focus = njmid1.1 }
completion_reward = {
add_stability = 0.1
}
}

#Add all^
focus = {
id = njmid1.3
icon = GFX_goal_generic_construct_civilian
x = 42
y = 0
cost = 5
completion_reward = {
add_ideas = dept_eco_infra
}
}

#Add all^
focus = {
id = njmid2.1
icon = GFX_goal_support_communism
x = 18
y = 1
cost = 5
prerequisite = { focus = njmid1.1 }
mutually_exclusive = { focus = njmid2.2 }
completion_reward = {
add_popularity = {
ideology = communism
popularity = 0.4
}
set_politics = {
    ruling_party = communism
    elections_allowed = no
  }
}
}

#Add all^
focus = {
id = njmid2.2

add_popularity = {
ideology = fascism
popularity = 0.4
}

    ruling_party = fascism
    elections_allowed = no
  }
}
}
